name: Drag n' Bag
description:
Work your way through a soul crushing day at a retail job, in hopes of getting that all important day off tomorrow.  The customer is always right so if you get even a single complaint you're working overtime. Be efficient but don't give the customer bags with too little, no one likes carrying 20 bags when one could suffice.

How To Play

  • Put cards from the conveyer into their respective bags
  • Fill the bags as much as possible to keep the customer happy
  • Put bags into the grey bagging area to give the bag to the customer
  • Be fast but don't mess up too much else the customer might report you to the manager

This was made for a 2 week class game jam at Digipen Institute of Technology 

Made by me and 5 classmates (3 artists, 1 sound designers, and 1 other programmer)
